Send Sensor Data &
Initial ID Context

span.p:
Choose Action:
Scan Existing OR Process New

span.p:
User Scans Existing Barcode
on Wood Block (using Svelte Barcode Scanner Page)

span.p:
Backend Process
Retrieve Initial Length
from DB

span.p: Display Initial Length on Svelte Page

span.p: User Cuts Wood and take Leftover Wood

span.p:
User Places Wood
on Physical Station

display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Node-RED Logic:
1. Receive Sensor Data &
Initial ID Context (from Svelte)
2. Decide: New vs. Leftover Wood
3. Generate New/Update Old IDs
4. Auto-Assign Location
(based on User Settings from DB)
5. Prepare Data for DB)

Label to Wood
